Class Location

java.lang.Object
  com.teama.pds.ActionNode
      com.teama.pds.Location

public class Location
extends ActionNode

User: Ryan Brown Handles receiving, putting trucks into delivery mode, and then returning trucks to the pizza shop.

Parameters:
